content: Sorry to hear that your launcher is stuck on 99%, can you send us the console logs?
Optifine not working? Did you extract the jar file and put it in your **libraries** folder instead of the regular mods folder?

ETIMEDOUT - A network connection timed out before completing. 
EHOSTUNREACH - A network connection was attempted to a remote host that is unreachable. 
ECONNRESET - A network connection was reset by the remote host. 
ENETUNREACH - A network connection was attempted through an unreachable network. 
ESOCKETTIMEDOUT - A socket operation timed out before completing.

key: /^(?=.*This site requires Javascript to work, please enable Javascript in your browser or use a browser\s+with Javascript support).*$/mgi
content: You better off switching to a different webhosting provider. Free webhosting providers always provide junk in your files.
